players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night. He's a threat to our town."
You: "Bob is the mafioso, let's lynch him!"
Bob: "I'm not the mafioso, I swear. I was just investigating Diana last night."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and found evidence. We should lynch him to protect our town."
